column2: Intro=Welcome to my dungeon losers, you'll become my slaves after that poker game.

Intro=They call me Lia the Black Leather Queen, you'll all soon find why.
Intro=I see that a new slave shipment has arrived, let's finish this quickly so I can train you all.
